d9c4f9fb353b8","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://f6fda447a62815e8064f47eff0dd1cf58d9207ad69b5d32280f8d7ed1d1e4621","dweb:/ipfs/QmfDRc7pxfaXB2Dh9np5Uf29Na3pQ7tafRS684wd3GLjVL"]},"src/modules/ModuleRegistry.sol":{"keccak256":"0x4b591b606c01475bfa0142c4c473d4deb40343f880350863d2cb33ef752a90a9","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://25f8a40f716b8195f18c789f9a89cc6ed723965f74ffe2702bae440a335aa5fd","dweb:/ipfs/QmTLtR4EYq7EZ8c38LU8zqUvGwjWhXdAyMwZPFY7UNmaYy"]},"src/modules/interfaces/IModule.sol":{"keccak256":"0x9cb61dccf50e4ec78096aa0ccd9f3658344e42483404f9135d82b6e1efcb0074","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://37db74df4e0e76614110b38046e29397ed9a159c674e48a44158ec50133497f3","dweb:/ipfs/QmYERbMJz19pTduWDExzvLgh8mDNanHpnpakEe3D8P56GZ"]}},"version":1}

params.id: The module ID to look up

returns._0: An array of ModuleInfo structs containing address, name, and category of all modules

getRoleAdmin(bytes32).details: Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}.

grantRole(bytes32,address).details: Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleGranted} event.

params.module: Address of the module to register
params.name: Name of the module

params.module: Address of the module to remove

renounceRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been revoked `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `callerConfirmation`. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

revokeRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

get(bytes4).notice: Get a module by its ID

remove(address).notice: Remove a module from the registry
